This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=ESAFETY.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2014-12-16T11:03:33Z Bodley, Malcolm 2014-12-16T11:03:24+00:00 2014-12-16T11:03:24+00:00 Re: best wishes https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ESAFETY;2e6cb7b4.1412 Hi Jackie<br><br>So sorry to hear your not going to be with us at Jisc, I for one will miss you greatly. It's been a pleasure and an honour to have worked with you, Jisc's loss.<br><br>Best wishes for the future<br><br>Regards<br><br>Malcolm Julia Taylor 2014-12-16T10:58:40+00:00 2014-12-16T10:58:40+00:00 Re: best wishes https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ESAFETY;e36628f.1412 Thank you Jackie for your contribution to the group. We could not have done without you.<br><br>-----Original Message-----<br>From: eSafety [mailto:ESAFETY@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Jackie Milne<br>Sent: 16 December 2014 10:50<br>To: ESAFETY@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: best wishes<br><br>Hi everyone,<br><br>Just a short note to say good luck for 2015!<br>I didn't apply for a new role in Jisc so this is my last couple of days with Jisc Legal. I just wanted to say that I have really enjoyed meeting and working with you all and wish you all the best for next year, with Jisc or otherwise. [...] Jackie Milne 2014-12-16T10:49:50+00:00 2014-12-16T10:49:50+00:00 best wishes https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ESAFETY;aa01ed9e.1412 Hi everyone,<br><br>Just a short note to say good luck for 2015!<br>I didn't apply for a new role in Jisc so this is my last couple of days with Jisc Legal. I just wanted to say that I have really enjoyed meeting and working with you all and wish you all the best for next year, with Jisc or otherwise. [...] Bodley, Malcolm 2014-11-07T15:05:16+00:00 2014-11-07T15:05:16+00:00 Fwd: Safer Internet Day education packs launched! https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ESAFETY;7785434d.1411 FYI<br><br>Sent from my iPhone<br><br>Begin forwarded message:<br><br>From: Hannah Broadbent <Hannah@childnet.com<mailto:Hannah@childnet.com>><br>Date: 7 November 2014 10:58:40 am GMT<br>To: "safetynet-mail@googlegroups.com<mailto:safetynet-mail@googlegroups.com>" <safetynet-mail@googlegroups.com<mailto:safetynet-mail@googlegroups.com>><br>Subject: Safer Internet Day education packs launched!<br><br>Hi all,<br><br>We’re pleased to announce that the Safer Internet Day 2015 Education Packs<http://www.saferinternet.org.uk/safer-internet-day/2015/education-packs> are now live! See www.saferinternetday.org.uk<http://www.saferinternetday.org.uk> for education packs, supporter registration and ideas for getting involved. [...] Martin Cooke 2014-11-05T08:36:36+00:00 2014-11-05T08:36:36+00:00 Well being and cyber bullying https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ESAFETY;9608f1a7.1411 We already have the UKCCIS but MPs are anxious to do more. Genie out the bag and no way to get it back in.<br>\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdensure that links between online safety, cyberbullying, and maintaining and protecting emotional wellbeing and mental health are fully articulated\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd.<br><br>http://www.theguardian.com/society/2014/nov/05/children-cyberbullying-self-harm-gaming-mps-concern<br><br>Martin<br><br>Martin Cooke<br>Jisc Regional Support Centre East Midlands<br>Loughborough College<br>LE11 3BT<br>01509618118<br>www.jiscrsc.ac.uk/eastmidlands<http://www.rsc-em.ac.uk/><br>Tel: 01509 618118 | Mobile: 07786526189<br>|Skype: martin.rsc | Web: www.jiscrsc.ac.uk<http://www.jiscrsc.ac.uk/><br>Join our series of free \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdIn Brief\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd webinars to discover tips, tools and strategies for addressing FELTAG\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds recommendation for 10% online delivery of learning. Book now<http://jiscevents.force.com/E/EventsMainPage?srvc=JISC%20RSC%20East%20Midlands> [...] Bodley, Malcolm 2014-10-28T15:06:32+00:00 2014-10-28T15:06:32+00:00 FW: New resource to help parents and carers speak with their children about pornography https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ESAFETY;db9ccb1d.1410 FYI<br><br>From: safetynet-mail@googlegroups.com [mailto:safetynet-mail@googlegroups.com] On Behalf Of Hannah Broadbent<br>Sent: 28 October 2014 10:28<br>To: safetynet-mail@googlegroups.com<br>Subject: New resource to help parents and carers speak with their children about pornography<br><br>Hi all,<br><br>I just wanted to share that we\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdve launched a new resource for parents and carers to help them have age-appropriate conversations about pornography with their children: www.childnet.com/parents-and-carers/hot-topics/pornography<http://www.childnet.com/parents-and-carers/hot-topics/pornography> [...] Martin Cooke 2014-10-17T10:03:29+00:00 2014-10-17T10:03:29+00:00 Loughborough College esafety course https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ESAFETY;f01bc766.1410 Paul McKean was speaking today at the Loughborough College Technology Celebration Day.<br><br>27 colleges have so far downloaded the Loughborough College esafety course.<br><br>http://blogs.loucoll.ac.uk/learningtechnology/2014/04/11/esafety-moodle-course/<br><br>The course is available for import into your own Moodle if you have 2.2 or above.<br>2 versions, 1 with badges and one without. Badges requires Moodle 2.5<br>To receive the resource please email eLearning@loucoll.ac.uk<mailto:eLearning@loucoll.ac.uk><br>and specify which version you would like. [...] Bodley, Malcolm 2014-07-11T10:13:32+00:00 2014-07-11T10:13:32+00:00 FW: University Resource https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ESAFETY;b3e03a90.1407 FYI<br><br>From: Kathryn Tremlett <Kathryn.Tremlett@swgfl.org.uk<mailto:Kathryn.Tremlett@swgfl.org.uk>><br>Date: Friday, 11 July 2014 10:56<br>To: "'safetynet-mail@googlegroups.com<mailto:'safetynet-mail@googlegroups.com>'" <safetynet-mail@googlegroups.com<mailto:safetynet-mail@googlegroups.com>><br>Subject: University Resource<br><br>Hi all,<br><br>I just wanted to draw your attention to the South West Grid for Learning’s fantastic new University Fact Sheets.<br><br>Many young adults are now looking forwards to going onto University representing a momentous occasion in their lives, often coupled with leaving home and signifying their first real taste of independence. [...] Martin Cooke 2014-04-23T10:36:46+00:00 2014-04-23T10:36:46+00:00 Loughborough College esafety course https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ESAFETY;d2fc8a76.1404 http://blogs.loucoll.ac.uk/learningtechnology<br><br>The launch of the Loughborough College eSafety course in February 2014 saw over 500 students<br>complete the course in its first month with a number of those achieving their gold badge.<br><br>The course is now available for import into your own Moodle if you have 2.2 or above.<br>2 versions, 1 with badges and one without. Badges requires Moodle 2.5<br>To receive the resource please email eLearning@loucoll.ac.uk<mailto:eLearning@loucoll.ac.uk><br>and specify which version you would like. [...] Camereen Swift 2014-04-23T09:32:49+00:00 2014-04-23T09:32:49+00:00 Re: Bex Lewis https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ESAFETY;cdb69b22.1404 Hi All<br><br>She is a workshop presenters at our end of year event in Sunderland on 5th June.<br><br>http://www.jiscrsc.ac.uk/northern/e-fest-14/the-presenters.aspx<br><br>Cam<br><br>From: Martin Cooke [mailto:Martin.Cooke@RSC-EM.AC.UK]<br>Sent: 23 April 2014 10:09<br>To: ESAFETY@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: Bex Lewis<br><br>Bex Lewis Raising children in a digital age Lion 2014<br>http://www.amazon.co.uk/Raising-Children-Digital-Age-Preparing/dp/0745956041<br>Not aimed at educationalists but at parents, so the focus is on children, but with much that is applicable to young people. This up-to-date exploration of the digital world is helpful and includes many useful resources. It attempts to focus on both the positive and negative aspects of the online world. It deals with some [...] Martin Cooke 2014-04-23T09:09:18+00:00 2014-04-23T09:09:18+00:00 Bex Lewis https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ESAFETY;f7c152e2.1404 Bex Lewis Raising children in a digital age Lion 2014<br>http://www.amazon.co.uk/Raising-Children-Digital-Age-Preparing/dp/0745956041<br>Not aimed at educationalists but at parents, so the focus is on children, but with much that is applicable to young people. This up-to-date exploration of the digital world is helpful and includes many useful resources. It attempts to focus on both the positive and negative aspects of the online world. It deals with some of the more prominent tools, esafety, legal issues, health, gaming, creativity and collaboration.<br>Bex Lewis has been working with Jisc on the Developing Digital Literacies project and she would make a useful speaker on [...]
